chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Andaya Forae, p. 18 (16)—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. A thin, birdlike woman, she is outwardly timid despite Aes Sedai agelessness. This makes her seem unlikely to be a good mediator, but she is in fact one of the best of them. See also Murasaka, Andaya.
